# Preface {.unnumbered}

## Installation {.unnumbered}

```{r}
#| echo: false
library(stelfi)
```


`stelfi` is on CRAN

```{r}
#| eval: false
install.packages("stelfi")
```

otherwise the development version of `stelfi` package can be installed from GitHub

```{r}
#| eval: false
devtools::install_github("cmjt/stelfi")
```



::: {.callout-note}

To cite `stelfi` use

```{r}
citation("stelfi")
```
:::
